original: 臨淮淮陰人，東吳將領，步騭長子。劉禪方降曹魏，陸抗與步協等諸將立即趁隙進攻蜀地，但前蜀國守將羅憲固守，吳軍無功而返。
text: A native of Huaiyin from Linhuai, a general of Soochow, the eldest son of the Stallion. Liu Chanfang surrendered to Cao Wei, Lu Kang and Bu Xie and other generals immediately took advantage of the gap to attack Shu, but the former Shu defender Luo Xian stayed on and Wu Jun returned without success.
